dmca.title: DMCA Notice for website http://cars-n-autos.blogspot.com
dmca.body:
Custom Auto Trim and Graphics Inc. 
4141 Jutland Drive Suite 140 San Diego CA 92117 (858) 273-5700 

April 12, 2007 

Google, Inc.
Ann: Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaints 
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway 
Mountain View, CA 94043 

Re: DMCA Notice for website http://cars-n-autos.blogspot.com/

The following blogger page has copied entire email newsletters including navigation from http://www.customstrim.com, and is serving these pages as scraped duplicate content on their blogger page with the intent of generating adsense income. 

This is the blog in question: 
http://cars-n-autos.blogspot.com/

User profile: 
http://ww2.blogger.com/profile/05867779143393210514 

These are the pages (not limited to) that this person has copied from our customer newsletters and served on blogspot without permission: 

http://cars-n-autos.blogspot.com/2007/O4/news-from-customautotrimcom-how-to-stop.html 
http://cars-n.autos.blogspotcom/2O07/04/news-from-customautotrimcom-how-to.html http://carS-n-autos.blopspocpm/2007l04/news-trm-custcmautotrimcom-dpnt.buv.html http://cars-n-auto.blogspot.com/2007/O4/carfan-heres-your-newsletter-from.html 

I am the copyright owner of this copied material. 

I have a good faith belief that the copyright owner, its agent, or the law does not authorize use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages. 

I swear, under penalty & perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

Mike Briqlia 
mikeb@customautotrim.com 
http://www.customautotrim.com 
858.273.5700
